## Entity class

Entity class. This class is a part of the ECS subsystem.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare class Entity 
```

## Remarks

This class should not be extended within the ECS subsystem, and should be used as a data layer to associate Component objects with a common object shape.

## Example

Mounting a component:

```ts
const entity = new Entity();
const component = new MyComponent();

entity.mount(component);
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [components](./core.entity.components.md) |  | Record&lt;string, string&gt; | Collection of type-keyed Component objects associated with this Entity. |
|  [uuid](./core.entity.uuid.md) |  | string | UUID for this Entity. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [hasComponent(component)](./core.entity.hascomponent.md) |  | Validate if a Component exists on this Entity. |
|  [hasType(type)](./core.entity.hastype.md) |  | Validate if a Component type exists on this Entity. |
|  [mount(components)](./core.entity.mount.md) |  | Mount one or more Component objects to this Entity. |
|  [remove(types)](./core.entity.remove.md) |  | Remove one or more Component types from this Entity. |
|  [unmount(components)](./core.entity.unmount.md) |  | Unmount one or more Component objects from this Entity. |
